Home - ChainLink Disc Golf To our valued US customers: We are temporarily pausing all shipments to the United States until further notice. Starting August 29, the U.S. is ending the â€œde minimisâ€ exemption, a policy that has allowed lower value packages from outside the U.S. to enter duty-free. 

Shipping to other countries around the world is continuing as normal.

Each disc purchase supports conservation efforts with $1 being donated directly to a conservation authority. Join Pulsea and learn the game! Sign up for your Free Trial! New  to Disc Golf? Camp Registration - Now Open! Disc Golf Camp at Albion Hills & Kelso Summer Camp at Albion Hills Disc golf camp is coming to Albion Hills and Kelso! Campers will learn how to play disc golf, enjoy outdoor adventure and have some classic summer fun at these week-long camps! WoW Camp at Kelso Chainlink Conservation Series Albion Hills Kelso Join us for the 2025 ChainLink Conservation Series events at TRCA's Albion Hills and Conservation Halton's Kelso! Buy NOW! New Arrival Toronto Course Tees Shop Now Wear your favourite Toronto course with an embroidered logo on these premium t-shirts. Course Feature Albion Hills Disc Golf Learn more A new 18 hole disc golf course at the Albion Hills Conservation Area is now open! This course will launch in a Blue layout for advanced level play. This park has many amenities that will make this course a destination for disc golfers with its unique topography and mix of open and wooded holes. Course feature Trail Hub Disc Golf Learn more Get outside this fall and enjoy the new 18 hole disc golf course at Trail Hub in Uxbridge! As the highest peak in the GTA, you'll be rewarded with stunning views of the fall foliage and surrounding region. This course offers a wide variety of wooded and open holes with lots of topography. Kelso Disc Golf Learn more Check out all 18 holes of the disc golf course at Kelso Conservation Area in Milton! You'll be sure to enjoy the topography and the beautiful views of the escarpment. Refreshments, retail and rentals are available at the Trailhead Shop. Course Feature Featured Gear Be part of the disc golf community! Shop disc golf merch and accessories that feature our local disc golf brands. Weâ€™ve got all your favourite disc golf gear to keep you looking your best on and off the course! Weâ€™re Toronto-based and can offer local pick-up or ship directly to you. check back again soon for more new items! Contact - Chingford Golf Course Skip to main content Chingford Golf Course London, England Home Gallery Flyover Visitors Clubs Hire Equipment Contact Online Booking Member Booking Visitor Booking Food at Chingford Golf Course Book Tee Times Contact Contact Chingford Golf Course 4 Bury Road, Chingford, London, England E4 7QJ Phone : 020 8529 2085 Email : chingfordgolfcourse@cityoflondon.gov.uk Social Media : How to find us By train Chingford Golf Course is served by London Overground from London Liverpool Street Station. Trains arrive and depart every 15 minutes. London Overground Chingford From Chingford station to the course is just a five minute walk. For walking directions, please visit Google Maps . For help planning your journey, we recommend Transport for Londonâ€™s Journey Planner . By car Chingford Golf Course can be reached from most of London and Essex. For help planning your route by road, we recommend Google Maps . Free parking is available at Bury Road, located directly adjacent to the cafÃ© and golf shop. By bus Chingford is easily reached by bus from across North and East London using routes 97, 179, 212, 313, 379, 385, 397 and 444. Connect with our team Owner, CEO, President Farina Headrick Farina Headrick has headed the DGA family since 2002 when she took over the day to day operations after Ed Headrick, the Father of Disc Golf, passed away. Farina is passionate about supporting the continued growth of the sport her husband founded in 1976.
